item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 18, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. arXiv moving from Cornell servers to Google Cloud (32 points | 16 comments)
2. Kagi Assistant is now available to all users (243 points | 137 comments)
3. Free high-performance cross-platform game engine (32 points | 13 comments)
4. Gemini 2.5 Flash (793 points | 413 comments)

7. I analyzed chord progressions in 680k songs (156 points | 70 comments)
8. An intro to DeepSeek's distributed file system (536 points | 83 comments)

10. Decreased CO2 during breathwork: emergence of altered states of consciousness (225 points | 83 comments)
11. What do I think about Lua after shipping a project with 60k lines of code? (134 points | 55 comments)

13. Unikernel Linux (UKL) (2023) (7 points | 1 comment)

22. HDR‑Infused Emoji (239 points | 130 comments)
23. Viral ChatGPT trend is doing 'reverse location search' from photos (42 points | 17 comments)

26. Google is illegally monopolizing online advertising tech, judge rules (765 points | 398 comments)

29. MCP Run Python (147 points | 54 comments)
30. Mux (YC W16) is hiring engineering managers for video at scale ( | hide)
